introduction.p: This control template is for <HScroll/>, <VScroll/>, <HTracker/>, <VTracker/> and <ProgressBar/>.

prop.name: Commands
prop.p: The type of this property is (vl::)presentation::controls::IScrollCommandExecutor*.
This property is set after this control template is applied to a control. It offers a way for this control template to communicate with the control.

prop.name: TotalSize
prop.p: This property defines the size of the content to scroll in a virtual unit.

prop.name: PageSize
prop.p: This property defines the size of the view port in a virtual unit.

prop.name: Position
prop.p: This property defines the position in the content of where the view port begins in a virtual unit.
